SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Rich Text: Discontinue Use of Non-RT Fields

Migrate all rich content on your B2B Commerce for Visualforce records to rich text (RT) fields. This release deprecates all non-RT fields, such as those for short and long descriptions.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: After you upgrade, the non-RT fields are still available on B2B Commerce for Visualforce custom objects, but the managed package no longer references those fields. The CC Admin global settings Always Use RT Fields and Copy Text to RT are also removed.

IMPORTANT To ensure that you don't lose any data, migrate any rich content from non-RT fields to the equivalent RT fields before you upgrade. If you have a significant amount of rich content to migrate to RT fields, you can automate the migration with a script.
SEE ALSO
Prepare Your Existing B2B Commerce for Visualforce Data for Upgrade
Example Scripts for Migrating Rich Text Field Content for B2B Commerce for Visualforce
